verses.text: Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová. D'a wal smasanil in k'ool ol wal wach' lolonel t'a Jehová.
Yacb'an pitzan into ol wal wach' lolonel t'ay. Yacb'an ayinto eq'ui, ol in b'itan t'a in Diosal.
Manh eyak'och anima niwan yelk'och yipoc he k'ool, yujto animanhej heb', yuj chi' max yal-laj skolwaj heb'.
Ayic scham heb', tz'ochkan heb' pokokal. Ha t'a jun k'u chi' slajwikanel tastac sna heb' sk'ulej.
Te wach' yic mach schaan scolwal sDiosal winhaj Jacob. Anhej Jehová Dios chi' ayoch yipoc sk'ool.
Ha Jehová b'oannac satcha’anh, lum lum, ha' mar yet' masanil tastac ay t'a junjun makan chi'. Tz'elnhejk'och tas syala'.
A' sb'oan yaj b'aj tz'ixtaj heb' anima, syak'anpax swael heb' ay swejel. A' scolanel heb' ayoch t'a preso.
Ha Jehová sjakan sat heb' max ujilaj yilani, squetzan k'e waan heb' stelwi. Xajan heb' anima wach' spensar yuj.
Ha Jehová scolan heb' anima ch'oc chonhab'il. Anhejton pax ha' tz'ilan heb' unin chamnac smam yet' heb' ix ix chamnac yetb'eyum. Palta tz'ak'ji somchaj heb' sk'ulan chukal yuj.
Ex aj Sion, a Jehová ol ak'an Yajalil t'a masanil tiempo. Ha ko Diosal ol och Reyal t'a junelnhej. Calec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová.
